page.title: 15One day of my life continued
page.content: On Tuesday in assembly we have hymn practice. Then reading groups are called I am in reading group A. When I have finshed my work I play with something or read a book. Then we go out to play. When we come in we have dinner and then go to play. When we come in we have register & finish our work. Then its time for tables. Then we go back to our class to wait for the bell to go. Then Mrs Thomas tell us to put our coats on and line up. Then we go out of school to our Mums. Then we pick up my brother and go to library. It takes a long time to choose a book. Then we go home and I watch my programmes. Then Dad comes home from work I have a game of pool with him. He usually wins. Then I have tea and watch T.V. with Mummy Daddy and Adam. Then we get ready for bed, Adam goes first, I go an hour after.
